snippet: A new app for a livery car company in New York is offering rides for women by women, but critics say the business reeks of gender discrimination.
abstract: Car service dispatch service known as SheTaxis in Long Island and Westchester County and SheRides in New York City teams up with existing companies to match female drivers with passengers who request them; only women or parties including women can request female drivers, prompting criticism from some legal experts who say service discriminates against men.
lead_paragraph: A new app for a livery car company in New York is offering rides for women by women, but critics say the business reeks of gender discrimination.

headline.main: SheRides, a New York Taxi Service Aimed at Women, Finds a Loyal Following
headline.print_headline: Using Female Taxi Drivers, Service Gains a Following
